pageContext.claim: “Look what's happening with the steel companies. They are doing -- they are expanding. They are going wild. … And, you know, the same thing with solar panels -- it was like a dead business, and we did a 30 percent tariff, because they were dumping all over the place.”
pageContext.analysis: Aside from a few, scattered signs of investment, there's no evidence to support these claims, and experts say the solar tariffs are job-killers.
